1858b001-c823-4334-a6cf-3ceb483322b0.Text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gains +1 damage {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. Their {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} chance is increased by +25% of the Warrior's total {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.
If the Warrior is wearing heavy armor or power armor, they will gain an addtional +2 deflection and +{uip|ArmorBonus|b3a78f30d7094e809610bbb750fc9aee}% armor.

af26970c-f579-46fa-8afb-38ff77f0ae83.Text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gains +{uip|BonusMP|1c61468f25fc410586a383c32050e971} MP and +{uip|CritDamage|1c61468f25fc410586a383c32050e971}% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain +{uip|BonusDamage|1c61468f25fc410586a383c32050e971}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.
If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} has less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain +{uip|BonusDamage|1c61468f25fc410586a383c32050e971}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} and reduce damage taken by -{uip|DamageReduction|1c61468f25fc410586a383c32050e971}%.

4015878d-03b8-4c4d-82ed-c420aaf85b38.Text: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{uip|TOU|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, +{uip|ArmorBonus|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and +{uip|THP|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

cef41f94-8d87-491a-a939-130bf155dacb.Text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gathers all their might for a crushing strike. Their next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} pushes the enemy away. The distance of the {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} is equal to {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} cells. If the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} check, they will gain a stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigue{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} cannot be used with a heavy rock saw.
